DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response that provides details of the circumstances and duration of exposure to environmental carcinogens.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any chemical, biological or physical agents that increase the risk of neoplasms in humans or animals.  Carcinogens include natural or synthesized compounds, certain viruses, and various sources of radiation.  A carcinogen may directly alter the genetic material of cells (genotoxic), thereby initiating or promoting the process of malignant transformation; it also may induce cancers by mechanisms that do not involve a direct alteration of cellular genetic material (non-genotoxic). (NCI04)_The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Concepts.definition: Any chemical, biological or physical agents that increase the risk of neoplasms in humans or animals.  Carcinogens include natural or synthesized compounds, certain viruses, and various sources of radiation.  A carcinogen may directly alter the genetic material of cells (genotoxic), thereby initiating or promoting the process of malignant transformation; it also may induce cancers by mechanisms that do not involve a direct alteration of cellular genetic material (non-genotoxic). (NCI04)

Property.preferredDefinition: Contact with infectious agents (bacteria or viruses) in a manner that promotes transmission and increases the likelihood of disease. (CDC)

Concepts.definition: The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Of short duration, extent, or distance._Description; a statement that represents something in words._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Describe circumstances and du
ReferenceDocuments.description: Describe circumstances and duration of exposure to environmental carcinogens if available
